name: pinboard-client
author: Brendan Murty <b@murty.io> (https://b.murty.io/)
description: A front-end for the Pinboard bookmarking service created with React.

scripts.start: npm run build; export NODE_ENV=development; set -o allexport; source .env; set +o allexport; node server.js
scripts.start-prod: npm run build; export NODE_ENV=production; set -o allexport; source .env; set +o allexport; node server.js
